Meth_Stand: M1 - as agreed as part of leachate monitoring plan
M2 - as per LFTGN03 or such other subsequent guidance as may be agreed in writing with the Environment Agency
M3 - as per M2 or such other subsequent guidance as may be agreed in writing with the Environment Agency

Mon_Period: Annually - first 6 years of operation then every 2 years

Ref_Period: Daily mean of validated hourly averages
Monthly mean of validated hourly averages
Periodic over minimum 30 minutes, maximum 8-hour period
95% of all 10-minute averages in any 24-hour period
95% of validated hourly averages within a calendar year
Mon_Period: Quarterly in first year then biannual

Ref_Period: 95% of validated daily means within a calendar year
Biannual periodic measurement average value over sample period of between 6 and 8 hours

Mon_Period: Twice per year or every 5000 tonnes asbestos deposited, whichever is greater
